body_html:
The corresponding tests in test_autograd.py are deleted because they otherwise throw "output does not require grad".

I'm confused. If out-of-place comparison test never gave a differentiable output, how was the test passing before? Is this actually another case of #4422?
body_text:
The corresponding tests in test_autograd.py are deleted because they otherwise throw "output does not require grad".

I'm confused. If out-of-place comparison test never gave a differentiable output, how was the test passing before? Is this actually another case of #4422?
body:
> The corresponding tests in test_autograd.py are deleted because they otherwise throw "output does not require grad".

I'm confused. If out-of-place comparison test never gave a differentiable output, how was the test passing before? Is this actually another case of #4422?
